players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he is the mafioso. We should vote for him to protect the town."
You: "As a concerned villager, I'm urging everyone to remain calm and continue discussing Alice's death. We should not jump to conclusions based on incomplete information."

You: "I propose that we form a group to search the town for any clues related to Alice's death. This might help us better understand what happened and make more informed decisions about who to vote for."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso, as I investigated him last night. We must vote him out to protect the town and avenge Alice."
